description:
Phantom Glide revolutionizes skiing and snowboarding with its high-performance base treatment, providing long-lasting glide improvements in varied snow conditions. Unlike traditional wax, it's a one-time investment, eliminating the need for frequent, costly applications. Improved glide enhances control, making your skiing or snowboarding experience more enjoyable. Plus, its eco-conscious approach leaves no environmental footprint, aligning with nature enthusiasts' responsible choice.

  • Lifetime of high-performance with a single application, eliminating the need for repeated and expensive waxing
  • Experience better control, predictability, and enhanced fun on the slopes thanks to improved glide
  • Choose an eco-conscious base treatment that leaves no environmental impact
name: DPS Skis Phantom Glide Single Application Kit
